bibl.title: Cleopatra's Carpet.
bibl.note: PLUTARCH, Caes. 49, 2. - 1. Cleopatra's 'carpet'. - 2. What was a στρωματόδεσμος / -ον? - 3. Cleopatra's height ["certainly a woman of much less than average height"].

bibl.title: Atti del XXII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. Firenze, 23-29 agosto 1998. Volume II

bibl.seg: Isabella ANDORLINI, Guido BASTIANINI, Manfredo MANFREDI e Giovanna MENCI (a cura di), Atti del XXII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. Firenze, 23-29 agosto 1998. Volume II (Firenze, 2001) pp. 1287-1293.
PLUTARCH, Caes. 49, 2. - 1. Cleopatra's 'carpet'. - 2. What was a στρωματόδεσμος / -ον? - 3. Cleopatra's height ["certainly a woman of much less than average height"].
